user.title: PilotSuite — Styx Setup
user.description: Choose how to set up PilotSuite with Styx, your local AI assistant.

manual_setup.title: Manual Setup
manual_setup.description: Configure your PilotSuite connection. Give your assistant a name (default: Styx).

data.seed_max_offers_per_hour: Seed limiter: max offers per hour
data.seed_min_seconds_between_offers: Seed limiter: min seconds between offers
data.seed_max_offers_per_update: Seed limiter: max offers per sensor update
data.events_forwarder_enabled: Core v1: forward Habitus zone events to Core (opt-in)
data.events_forwarder_max_batch: Core v1: forwarder max batch size
data.events_forwarder_forward_call_service: Core v1: also forward call_service events (opt-in)
data.events_forwarder_persistent_queue_enable: Core v1: persistent forwarder queue (store unsent events across HA restarts)
data.events_forwarder_persistent_queue_max_si: Core v1: persistent queue max size (drop-oldest)
data.events_forwarder_persistent_queue_flush_: Core v1: persistent queue flush interval (seconds)
data.devlog_push_enabled: Dev: push sanitized log snippets to Core
data.devlog_push_max_lines: Dev: read last N log lines
data.ha_errors_digest_max_lines: Ops: HA error digest read last N lines
data.events_forwarder_include_habitus_zones: Core: include Habitus zone entities in forwarding
data.events_forwarder_include_media_players: Core: include media players in forwarding

habitus_zones.title: Habitus zones
habitus_zones.description: Create and manage curated zones (independent from Home Assistant Areas). Each zone requires motion/presence + at least one light.

backup_restore.title: Backup / restore
backup_restore.description: Import a previously generated local config snapshot. This overwrites Habitus zones and selected options. Secrets remain unchanged if redacted.

import_snapshot_confirm.title: Confirm import
import_snapshot_confirm.description:
This will import {zones} Habitus zones and update options from the snapshot.

Tokens are not imported unless explicitly included (redacted values keep your current token).

create_zone.title: Create Habitus zone
create_zone.description: Pick one or more areas/rooms (optional), then choose a motion/presence entity and at least one light. If area entities are available, motion and lights are auto-suggested.

candidate_suggestion.title: CoPilot suggestion: {title}
candidate_suggestion.description:
CoPilot found a reusable pattern and suggests turning it into an automation.{evidence}

**Next steps:**
1. Go to [Settings > Automations & Scenes > Blueprints](HA_BLUEPRINTS_URL)
2. Import the CoPilot blueprint using the link below
3. Configure your automation
4. Return here and click **Fix** to complete this suggestion

Blueprint link: [CoPilot A>B Blueprint]({blueprint_url})

seed_suggestion.title: PilotSuite suggestion: {title}

log_manifest_parse_error.title: Custom integration has invalid manifest.json: {integration}
log_manifest_parse_error.description: Home Assistant reported errors parsing manifest.json for this custom integration. This can prevent startup or break other components. Click Fix to disable the integration (reversible).

log_setup_failed.title: Setup failed for custom integration: {integration}
log_setup_failed.description: Home Assistant reported that this custom integration failed during setup. Check the log details and the integration code/version.

log_state_attr_oversize.title: State attributes too large: {entity_id}
log_state_attr_oversize.description: This entity is writing attributes bigger than Home Assistant's recommended limit (16384 bytes). This can cause recorder/database and performance issues. Consider reducing attributes or moving data elsewhere.

log_blocking_import_module.title: Blocking call detected: import_module
log_blocking_import_module.description: Home Assistant detected a blocking import_module call on the event loop. This can cause delays and timeouts. Update/replace the integration responsible for the blocking call.

events_forwarder_unhealthy.title: Events forwarder is not delivering events

entity_tags.title: Entity tags
entity_tags.description: Manage entity tags — assign HA entities to custom tags for targeted monitoring and LLM context.

habitus_zones.title: Habitus zones
habitus_zones.description: Create and manage curated zones (independent from Home Assistant Areas). Each zone requires motion/presence + at least one light.

backup_restore.title: Backup / restore
backup_restore.description: Import a previously generated local config snapshot. This overwrites Habitus zones and selected options. Secrets remain unchanged if redacted.

import_snapshot_confirm.title: Confirm import
import_snapshot_confirm.description:
This will import {zones} Habitus zones and update options from the snapshot.

Tokens are not imported unless explicitly included (redacted values keep your current token).

create_zone.title: Create Habitus zone
create_zone.description: Pick one or more areas/rooms (optional), then choose a motion/presence entity and at least one light. If area entities are available, motion and lights are auto-suggested.

neurons.title: Neural System Configuration
neurons.description: Configure context, state, and mood neurons for the PilotSuite neural system. Entities assigned here will be used for pattern recognition and mood evaluation.

data_description.neuron_context_entities: Entities for context neurons (presence, time, weather, etc.)
data_description.neuron_state_entities: Entities for state neurons (energy, comfort, stress, etc.)
data_description.neuron_mood_entities: Entities that influence mood (lights, media, climate, etc.)

generate_dashboard.title: Generate dashboard YAML
generate_dashboard.description: Creates a Lovelace YAML dashboard file for all Habitus zones. The file is saved in the pilotsuite-styx/ configuration folder (with legacy mirror in ai_home_copilot/).

publish_dashboard.title: Publish dashboard to www
publish_dashboard.description: Copies the latest generated dashboard to www/pilotsuite-styx/ for easy download (with legacy mirror in www/ai_home_copilot/).
